alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 6:23PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lincoln and east central Casey Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 623 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Liberty, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Lincoln and east central Casey Counties, including the following locations... Walltown, Waynesburg and Middleburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
